import "./navbar.css" import { Dropdown } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useState } from 'react'; import logo from "../../images/logo.png" const Navbar =()=>{ const [showDropdown, setShowDropdown] = useState(false); const [Classic, setClassic] = useState("hide"); return( <>
setClassic("hide") } onMouseOver={() => setClassic("show")} style={{ width: '166px' }} > Men Action Another action Something else
) } export default Navbar;
